title: EPAM Systems
desc: Worked with the team to develop and maintain a large scale multi-platform application for a big betting company. The brunt of the work was done in Angular and NodeJS, where I worked closely with my colleagues to ship a high end product, with weekly updates. I was tasked with implementing new features, finding performance effective visual solutions and shipping the application to production.

title: Codeplicity
desc: I was a part of a large scale team developing numerous web applications ranging from single page websites to full blown applications. The front part of the app was using our custombuilt JavaScript framework. The technologies used in the projects weremostly HTML, CSS, JavaScript and PHP.

title: Wonderland AI
desc: I brought improvements to the existing ecosystem by working on developing a task tracking system within Google Sheets, using GoogleScript. I created and maintained the website while continuously implementing and refining new features.
